main event: A U.F.O. with a blue pulsating light was observed in Stratford, Connecticut on May 12, 1967 at 10:30 A.M.
interesting points: The object was described as having bright white and bluish colors with pulsating characteristics., Witnesses reported that the object appeared similar to automobile headlights and was silent., There was a significant interval of 11 years between the sightings., The object was in sight for approximately 30 seconds before it seemed to vanish behind a house., The UFO was estimated to be about 1 mile away and moving at an approximate speed of 50 MPH.
